title: Build audit log viewer with filters, detail drawer, retention indicator
description: Audit log per spec section 3.3 and wireframe 6.3: Table with timestamp, actor, action, resource, status columns. Filter bar (date range, user, type, search). Quick filter chips (MiFID 5yr, GDPR Events, Security, Errors). Expandable row details. Right-slide drawer showing full event JSON, related events, export options. Pagination. Retention timeline indicator (Hot/Warm/Cold/Delete).

title: Build pricing page with 3 tiers, comparison table, calculator, FAQ
description: Pricing page per spec section 3.4: Monthly/annual toggle (15% discount). 3-tier cards: Developer (Free), Business (€499/mo), Enterprise (Custom). Feature comparison table. Interactive cost calculator with sliders for rollups, nodes, txns. 6-8 FAQ accordion items. Trust badges footer.

comments.author: presto/polecats/nux
comments.text: Pricing page complete: 3-tier cards, monthly/annual toggle, comparison table, cost calculator, 8 FAQs, trust badges. Commit 8a40537. Push failed - SSH key issue needs resolution.

title: Digest: mol-witness-patrol
description: Patrol 11: nux committed build fixes, cleaning workspace, near completion.

title: Update hero and value props for neobank positioning
description:
attached_molecule: pr-wisp-4ur
attached_at: 2026-01-27T09:15:37Z
dispatched_by: mayor

Update marketing components to target neobank buyers with Ethereum-anchored positioning:

hero.tsx:
- Change headline from 'Enterprise Compliance & Privacy Layer for Ethereum' to 'Ethereum-Native Banking Infrastructure'
- Subheadline: 'Instant stablecoin payments. Tokenized treasury yields. Built-in compliance. Secured by Ethereum.'
- Emphasize Ethereum as the settlement layer - institutional grade security and finality
- NO mention of L2s/rollups - focus on Ethereum as anchor

Key Ethereum stats to include:
- $59B+ stablecoin issuance on Ethereum (62% market share)
- Ethereum = primary settlement layer for programmable money
- Institutional adoption: JPMorgan, BlackRock building on Ethereum
- 'Secured by Ethereum' as trust signal

value-props.tsx:
- Reorder: Ethereum Security, Instant Settlement, Yield Generation, Cost Reduction, Compliance Built-In
- Add 'Ethereum Settlement' prop: 'Anchored to Ethereum for institutional-grade security and finality'

use-cases.tsx:
- Add 'Neobank Infrastructure' as primary
- Frame all use cases as 'powered by Ethereum'

Research sources:
- BlackRock report on Ethereum as settlement standard
- ether.fi neobank growth on Ethereum
- Grayscale 2026 outlook on stablecoins
notes: Implemented: Updated hero.tsx, value-props.tsx, use-cases.tsx for Ethereum-anchored neobank positioning. Hero: 'Ethereum-Native Banking Infrastructure' headline, stablecoin/yield subheadline, Ethereum stats. Value props: Reordered with Ethereum Settlement first, added yield/cost reduction. Use cases: Neobank Infrastructure primary, all framed as 'Powered by Ethereum'.

title: Add cost savings calculator to pricing page
description:
attached_molecule: pr-wisp-92l
attached_at: 2026-01-27T09:16:00Z
dispatched_by: mayor

Add SavingsCalculator component to /pricing page:
- Monthly transaction volume input (slider or input)
- Cross-border percentage input
- Current provider cost assumption
- Presto cost calculation based on volume
- Annual savings projection with visual chart
- ROI timeline visualization

Include case study stats:
- 'Neobank X saved $1.2M/year on cross-border fees'
- '97% reduction in payment processing costs'

Addresses CTO JTBD: 'Help me reduce operational costs while scaling'
notes: Implemented SavingsCalculator component with: transaction volume and cross-border percentage inputs, savings calculation comparing industry average fees vs Presto fees, 5-year cost projection bar chart, ROI break-even timeline, case study stats (.2M/year savings, 97% cost reduction), responsive design following existing patterns

title: Add gig economy payroll batch demo
description:
attached_molecule: pr-wisp-c35
attached_at: 2026-01-27T09:16:29Z
dispatched_by: mayor

Add payroll demo scenario to payments page:
- PayrollBatchDemo component
- Worker list visualization (10,000 workers across 15 countries)
- Batch execution button with real-time progress
- Per-country settlement status
- Cost comparison: Traditional payroll ($150K/month) vs Presto ($5K/month)
- Settlement time comparison: Weekly batches vs instant per-transaction

Demo scenario: 'Pay 10,000 gig workers in 15 countries in under 60 seconds'

Addresses JTBD: 'Help me serve the global gig economy'
notes: Implemented PayrollBatchDemo component with: worker visualization (10K workers, 15 countries), batch execution with real-time progress animation, per-country settlement status grid, cost comparison (K vs K/mo), and 97% annual savings display.

title: Setup Next.js 14 project with shadcn/ui, Tailwind, design tokens per spec
description:
attached_molecule: pr-wisp-2cd
attached_at: 2026-01-25T11:56:13Z
dispatched_by: mayor

Create Next.js 14+ App Router project. Install shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS 3.4+. Configure design system: Primary Blue #0066FF, Gray scale, semantic colors, EU Blue #003399/Gold #FFCC00. Inter + JetBrains Mono fonts. Dark mode support with bg #0F172A. Component tokens per section 4 of spec.

title: Build admin dashboard with KPIs, activity timeline, network grid, compliance status
description: Dashboard per spec section 3.1 and wireframe 6.1: Collapsible left sidebar (260px/64px). Top header with search, notifications, user menu, theme toggle. 4 KPI cards (Active Rollups, 24h Txns, Uptime %, Alerts) with sparklines. Activity timeline with severity colors. Network status grid with status badges. Resource utilization charts. Compliance gauges (GDPR/MiCA/DORA progress bars).

title: Build marketing homepage with hero, trust bar, value props, testimonial, CTAs

Trust bar with logos. 4-card value prop grid (EU Data Sovereignty, Compliance Built-In, 5-Day Deployment, 99.99% Uptime). Tabbed product overview. Use case cards. Testimonial with photo. Compliance badge row (SOC2, ISO27001, GDPR, MiCA). Split CTA section. Full footer with newsletter.

title: Add stablecoin payment demo with live transaction flow
description:
attached_molecule: pr-wisp-cd1
attached_at: 2026-01-27T08:57:18Z
dispatched_by: mayor

Create new /dashboard/payments page with:
- PaymentDemo component - Interactive send/receive with simulated live transaction
- StablecoinSelector - USDC, USDT, PYUSD, RLUSD support
- SettlementTimer - Shows <3 min settlement vs 3-5 day traditional
- FeeBreakdown - Transparent fee comparison (traditional $25-50 vs Presto <$0.10)
- PaymentHistory - Recent transactions with blockchain explorer links

This is the #1 JTBD gap: 'Help me integrate stablecoin rails without becoming a crypto company'

title: Digest: mol-witness-patrol
description: Patrol 1: furiosa already nuked, nux/slit actively working (cross-border viz + yield dashboard). Refinery running. No incidents.

title: Build 7-step rollup deployment wizard with EU compliance settings
description: Wizard per spec section 3.2 and wireframe 6.2: Horizontal stepper with 7 steps (Config, Network, DA Layer, Infra, Integrate, Comply, Review). Step 1: name, type (L2/L3/Validium), stack (Polygon CDK/OP Stack/etc). Step 2: gas token, block time slider, gas limit, sequencer mode. Step 3: DA provider cards with cost estimator. Step 4: region map with EU highlight. Step 5: integrations checkboxes. Step 6: EU compliance settings (data residency, audit logging, GDPR/MiCA/DORA tags). Step 7: review summary + deploy. Right-side summary panel.

title: Pre-existing type error in DeploymentWizard
description: Type error in src/components/deploy/DeploymentWizard.tsx:50 - resolver type mismatch between deploymentWizardSchema and DeploymentWizardFormData. Blocks npm run build.

title: Add cross-border payment visualization with corridor comparison
description:
attached_molecule: pr-wisp-14t
attached_at: 2026-01-27T08:57:41Z
dispatched_by: mayor

Add to PaymentDemo:
- CorridorSelector - US→Philippines, EU→Nigeria, UK→India corridors
- CostComparison - Side-by-side visualization: Traditional ($25-50, 3-5 days) vs Presto (<$0.10, <3 min)
- LiveTransaction - Simulated payment with real-time status updates
- BlockchainProof - Transaction hash, block confirmation, explorer link
- RecipientExperience - What the recipient sees on their end

Addresses JTBD: 'Help me settle cross-border payments in minutes, not days'
notes: Implemented cross-border payment demo at /demo/payments with 5 components: CorridorSelector (US-PH, EU-NG, UK-IN), CostComparison, LiveTransaction, BlockchainProof, RecipientExperience. Also fixed pre-existing build issues (Tailwind v4, tsconfig paths, missing deps). Filed pr-jf8 for remaining TypeScript error in DeploymentWizard.

title: Add yield generation dashboard with tokenized treasury integration
description:
attached_molecule: pr-wisp-mi1
attached_at: 2026-01-27T08:58:05Z
dispatched_by: mayor

Create yield dashboard (can be new page /dashboard/yield or section in main dashboard):
- YieldOverview - Current APY (4.5%), total yield earned
- TreasuryAllocation - Visual breakdown of yield sources (T-bills, money market)
- YieldAccrual - Real-time animation showing yield accumulating
- YieldComparison - Traditional savings (0.5% APY) vs Presto (4.5% APY) with dollar amounts
- YieldHistory - Historical chart of yield over time

Addresses JTBD: 'Help me offer competitive yield without complex DeFi exposure'
notes:
Implemented yield dashboard at /dashboard/yield with 5 components:
- YieldOverview: Shows current 4.5% APY and total earnings
- TreasuryAllocation: Visual breakdown of T-bills (60%), EU bonds (25%), money market (10%), reserve (5%)
- YieldAccrual: Real-time animation showing yield accumulating per second/minute/hour
- YieldComparison: Interactive slider comparing traditional 0.5% APY vs Presto 4.5% APY
- YieldHistory: Historical chart with 7d/30d/90d/1y period selection
Added Yield link to sidebar navigation.
